content.raw:
The point of tick-tock is to provide users with a way of transitioning their code, through both documentation and compiler messages. We make no guarantee of API/ABI compatibility between major versions. A person should *not* expect their code to compile if they upgrade from gazebo7 to gazebo8. 

If this function removed then a user will have a more difficult time finding the new function.

Good point on the name change, it has been reverted.
content.html:
The point of tick-tock is to provide users with a way of transitioning their code, through both documentation and compiler messages. We make no guarantee of API/ABI compatibility between major versions. A person should not expect their code to compile if they upgrade from gazebo7 to gazebo8.

If this function removed then a user will have a more difficult time finding the new function.

Good point on the name change, it has been reverted.
